title: New: No Middle Name – Fading Photo
body:
Love the gorgeously romantic edge to this new track from David Bailey aka **No Middle Name**, lifted from his forthcoming second LP.

There’s an 80’s tinge to the songwriting, whilst the sound recalls the likes of Beach Fossils or Wild Nothing. ‘I didn’t fall in love to feel this bad’ – a sentiment I’m sure we can all relate to. Check out _Fading Photo_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
